title: Where to Get Eevee in Diamond, Pearl, & Platinum

steps.title: Get an Eevee.
steps.content: Get an Eevee. To get an Eevee in Diamond and Pearl, beat the Elite 4 and then talk to Bebe in Hearthome City. In Platinum just talk to her. Alternatively, Eevee can be caught in the Trophy Garden.

steps.title: Breed your Eevee to get a total of seven Eggs, and then do the following:
steps.content: Breed your Eevee to get a total of seven Eggs, and then do the following:

steps.title: Get a Vaporeon.
steps.content: Get a Vaporeon. To get a Vaporeon, you need a Water Stone. There is one located on Route 213, you can also find some in the Underground.

steps.title: Get a Jolteon.
steps.content: Get a Jolteon. To get a Jolteon, you need a Thunderstone. There is one located in Sunyshore City, you can also find some Underground.

steps.title: Get a Flareon.
steps.content: Get a Flareon. To get a Flareon, you need a Fire Stone. There are 2 located in Fuego Ironworks, you can also find some in the Underground.

steps.title: Get an Espeon.
steps.content: Get an Espeon. To get an Espeon, max out Eevee's happiness, then level it up during the morning/day.

steps.title: Get an Umbreon.
steps.content: Get an Umbreon. To get an Umbreon, max out Eevee's happiness, then level it up during the evening/night.

steps.title: Get a Leafeon.
steps.content: Get a Leafeon. To get a Leafeon, level Eevee up in Eterna Forest. There's a Mossy Rock at the top left of the Eterna Forestâ€”touching it will evolve Eevee into a Leafeon.

steps.title: Get a Glaceon.
steps.content: Get a Glaceon. To get a Glaceon, level Eevee up on Route 217. Look for the Icy Rock around Route 217. Touching it will evolve your Eevee into a Glaceon.
